front.title: Configuring BFD with DHCP and Other Musings

abstract.t: This document defines a method for configuring BidirectionalForwarding Detection (BFD) by an IP Edge device using DHCPv4 orDHCPv6. It provides motivation for the new functionality, definesnew DHCP options to assist with the task and outlines the rules forconfiguring BFD on an IP endpoint for different network topologies.The document also discusses endpoint behavior upon BFD failure.Comments on this draft should be directed to rtg-bfd@ietf.org.
